EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
View Pipeline Analytics Dashboard Inside Personalization App

You can view the pipeline analytics graphs and metrics directly in the Einstein Personalization app by creating an app page and adding the Analytics dashboard to it.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To view Personalization Intelligence app metrics:	Personalization Intelligence User
To create and save Lightning pages in the Lightning App Builder:	Customize Application
From Setup, enter App Builder in the Quick Find box, then select Lightning App Builder.
Click New.
Select App Page and then click Next.
Give your app page a label, and then click Next.
The label can be up to 80 characters.
Select One Region from the list of Standard Templates, and click Done.
On the left pane, select CRM Analytics Dashboard under the Standard components and drag it onto the page. You can also click Add Component(s) Here on the page, and then select CRM Analytics Dashboard from the left pane.
On the right pane, under Dashboard, click and select the appropriate pipeline analytics dashboard from the list.
Configure the settings and display options for the dashboard, and click Save.
Click Activation in the top-right corner of the page, and configure your app page settings.
Click the LIGHTNING EXPERIENCE tab and select Personalization from the list of apps.
Click Add page to app to add your created page to the Personalization app.
Drag the page to the appropriate position where you want it to be displayed in the app, then click Save.

Navigate to the Personalization app, and the newly created page appears inside the app along with the other tabs.
